name: Skyward Spine
desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

values.desc: Increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> and increases Normal ATK SPD by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a <color=#99FFFFFF>50%</color> chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

Increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>10%</color> and increases Normal ATK SPD by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a <color=#99FFFFFF>50%</color> chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>55%</color> of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

Increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color> and increases Normal ATK SPD by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a <color=#99FFFFFF>50%</color> chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>70%</color> of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

Increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>14%</color> and increases Normal ATK SPD by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a <color=#99FFFFFF>50%</color> chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>85%</color> of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

Increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>16%</color> and increases Normal ATK SPD by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a <color=#99FFFFFF>50%</color> chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.
